text: The 2015 CONCACAF Gold Cup was the 13th edition of the CONCACAF Gold Cup. It took place in the United States and Canada. == Qualified teams == * (co-host) * * * * * * * * * * * (co-host) == Group stage == === Group A === Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 2 1 0 4 2 +2 7 3 1 1 1 2 2 0 4 3 0 3 0 3 3 0 3 3 0 1 2 2 4 –2 1 === Group B === Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 2 1 0 4 2 +2 7 3 0 3 0 3 3 0 3 3 0 2 1 1 2 –1 2 3 0 2 1 0 1 –1 2 === Group C === Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 2 1 0 9 5 +4 7 3 1 2 0 10 4 +6 5 3 1 0 2 1 8 –7 3 3 0 1 2 1 4 –3 1 === Ranking of third placed teams === Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 0 3 0 3 3 0 3 3 1 0 2 1 8 –7 3 3 0 2 1 1 2 –1 2 == Knockout stage == All match times below are in Eastern Daylight Time (EDT). ===Quarterfinals=== \---- \---- \---- ===Semifinals=== \---- ===Third place playoff=== ===Final=== ==Statistics== ===Goalscorers=== ;7 goals * Clint Dempsey ;6 goals * Andrés Guardado ;4 goals * Oribe Peralta ;2 goals * Duckens Nazon * Darren Mattocks * Giles Barnes * Garath McCleary * Carlos Vela * Luis Tejada * Sheldon Bateau * Keron Cummings * Kenwyne Jones * Michael Bradley ;1 goal * Roy Miller * David Ramírez * Bryan Ruiz * Maikel Reyes * Dustin Corea * Carlos Ruiz * Carlos Discua * Andy Najar * Rodolph Austin * Jobi McAnuff * Giovani dos Santos * Jesús Corona * Paul Aguilar * Roberto Nurse * Blas Pérez * Alberto Quintero * Román Torres * Andre Boucaud * Cordell Cato * Joevin Jones * Yohance Marshall * Omar Gonzalez * Aron Jóhannsson * Gyasi Zardes ;1 own goal * Kenwyne Jones (playing against Mexico) == Other websites == CONCACAF Official website Category:2015 in association football Category:2015 in the United States Category:2015 in Canada Category:Soccer in Canada Category:Soccer in the United States
